title: Alabama Man Pleads Guilty to Stowing Weapons in His Truck on Jan. 6
sub_head: Defendant Lonnie Coffman says Molotov cocktails were years old and he had no plans to use them
body:
WASHINGTON—A 71-year-old Alabama man admitted Friday to stowing Molotov cocktails and other weapons in his truck parked near the U.S. Capitol on Jan. 6, saying he hadn’t planned to use the explosives during the riot.
In documents filed in federal court, Lonnie Coffman pleaded guilty to two criminal counts, possessing a destructive device and a handgun without a license. In exchange, prosecutors agreed to dismiss 15 other weapons-related counts Mr. Coffman had faced. He also pleaded guilty to a related charge filed in Alabama.
